template.template: Huawei S6720-30C-EI Interface Counter CRC Errors
template.name: Huawei S6720-30C-EI Interface Counter CRC Errors
template.description:
English: Count CRC errors interface switches S Huawei and perform triggers. if last reading has a difference of 10, will perform trigger information if last reading has a difference of 100, will perform trigger warning if last reading has a difference of 1000, will perform trigger high
Portuguese: Conta CRC erros das interfaces de switches huawei S e dispara triggers. caso for mais que 10 entre ultima leitura e penultima dispara trigger information caso for mais que 100 entre ultima leitura e penultima dispara trigger warning caso for mais que 1000 entre ultima leitura e penultima dispara trigger high
